President Morsi's speech is now before the General Assembly of the United Nations in New York in Arabic
I stand before you today stems from the real legitimacy wanted to express the people of Egypt was thanks to God what the president wanted
Every Egyptian today has to feel a high self-esteem that puts him on a higher moral ground
The Egyptian revolution that established the legitimacy I represent before you today was not the product of a moment or an uprising, nor was it a wind in spring or autumn.

This revolution and its predecessors and the subsequent revolutions presented a lesson to humanity and sounded a warning to anyone who tries, whatever, to present his interests to the interests of peoples.
Egypt is the revolution, and it has softened the contradictions and oases of a past era. It stands at the forefront of the international community defending justice, truth, freedom and dignity.
Egypt's determination to regain its place among nations and play an active role in international issues stems from the will of its people and the legitimacy of its regime.
The first issue that the world should engage in making every effort to resolve on the basis of justice and dignity is the Palestinian issue
Legitimacy continues to be unable until today to achieve the hopes and aspirations of the Palestinian people and even implement its decisions issued in this regard # President
The fruits of freedom and dignity that have been plundered for the Arab peoples, and for the peoples of the world as a whole, should not be far from the noble hand of the Palestinian people.
Council of Europe Development Bank (CEB) approves 400.000€ donation for Camp Konik 1 http://t.co/lQA5A744 @coe #Montenegro
It is disgraceful for the free world to accept the continued involvement of the international community in denying the rights of a nation longing for independence and building its nation for decades
In support of the inalienable rights of the Palestinians
Syrian blood is more precious than being wasted day and night
The Syrian people dear brother to the heart of every Egyptian and Egyptian # President
The brotherly Syrian people deserve to have the opportunity to freely and independently express any external or internal pressure on the form of legitimacy that the president desires

We will continue to work hard and diligently by all means to put an end to the suffering of the people of Syria and to give the opportunity to freely choose a system of government expressed by the President
I emphasize in this regard that the Quartet initiative is not closed to its parties, but is open to all who have something that can contribute positively to resolving the crisis.
This suffering we are all responsible for and we must all move to stop the tragedy of this era in Syria # President
Egypt will work with its Arab brothers so that this nation occupies its rightful place in the world
Egypt will work to ensure that the Islamic summit on its soil is a platform for enhancing understanding and promoting the principles of dialogue among civilizations
Sudan needs today more support than ever # President
Sudan has made great sacrifices in the search for peace and stability, but frankly it has not received the international support it deserves and the time has come for its support
The election of a democratic president in Somalia is a sign of stability and I call on the United Nations to help the brotherly people achieve a better tomorrow
The people of the region have recovered their freedom and will not allow the internal or external injustice
The people of the region no longer accept to remain a state outside the nuclear nonproliferation regime
Acceptance of the principle of preemption is rejected by the people of the region so that the law of the jungle will not prevail
There is no alternative to the complete elimination of nuclear weapons and all weapons of mass destruction under international agreements
It is the right of all countries of the world, including the countries of the region and Egypt, of course, to use nuclear energy for peaceful purposes
The world has a responsibility to support Africa's development efforts and support its efforts to recover its looted wealth
[Adm-08] Bloomberg Television tells the world why it's a good idea to invest in the Philippines. http://t.co/jEMCLSZ4
Egypt continues to work with its brothers in Africa to raise the standard of living through the exchange of experiences and successful experiences
The activation of the role of the United Nations General Assembly and the reform of the Security Council must be the top priority that must be addressed seriously
I call for the establishment of a special United Nations organ that will be concerned with youth education and training to achieve their aspirations
The international system will not be upright as long as the double standards # President
Migrant Muslims in some countries are subject to discrimination and violation of their fundamental rights and campaigns to undermine their holy sites is unacceptable
We reject what some individuals have made of the abuse of Muhammad (r) and the habit of doing so # President
It is necessary to unite in the face of hatred and discrimination based on religion or ethnicity
The abhorrent actions recently published in an organized campaign against Muslims' sanctities are unacceptable and we must consider how we can protect the stability of the world.
Egypt protects freedom of expression without prejudice to the rights and sanctities of others
There is a need for a new economic governance that is people-centered and based on closer cooperation based on complementarity of interests and mutual benefit among peoples
This is the vision of Egypt, Muslims and non-Muslims, men, women and youth
I look forward with great optimism and see peace based on justice which gives everyone their full rights and does not distinguish between human beings and human beings
The peace that I have come to you in his message is a peace of mutual interests, love and respect based on justice and freedom. God hears, sees and hopes for a better future.
Soon we will publish excerpts from the President's speech in English
The headlines of president #Morsi speech in front of #UNGA coming to you in English shortly
Today, every Egyptian shares a sense of self-confidence, which puts him / her on higher moral grounds #Morsi

The vision of the new Egypt that we strive to realize for our nation also constituents the frame of action we present to the world #Morsi
Post-revolution Egypt is among the leading nations defending justice, truth, freedom, and dignity #Morsi
The international legitimacy remains unable until now to realize the hopes and aspirations of the Palestinian people #Morsi
Our brothers and sisters in Palestine must also taste the fruits of freedom and dignity #Morsi
It is disgraceful that settlement activities continue on the territories of Palestinians #Morsi
I call for immediate measures to put an end to colonization, settlement activities and alteration in identity of Jerusalem #Morsi
I assure you of Egypt full support to any course of action Palestine decides to follow in the United Nations #Morsi
The blodshed in #Syria and the humanitarian crisis that has unfolded must be stopped #Morsi
The blood that is shed in #Syria that is dear and near to us is far too valuable to continue to be shed day and night #Morsi
Syrian people, dear to our hearts, deserve to hope for a future of freedom and dignity #Morsi
We will continue to work to put an end to the suffering of the Syrian people #Morsi
I would like to emphasize that the initiative is open to all those who wish to positively contribute in resolving the Syrian crisis #Morsi
Egypt is also committed to supporting the mission of Al-Akhdar Al-Ibrahimi to Syria #Morsi
Egypt's is committed to working with its Arab brothers and sisters to reclaim our rightful position in the world #Morsi
Our brothers and sisters in Sudan need, more than ever, your support #Morsi
#Sudan has made great sacrifices in its quest for peace and stability. But to be frank: it has not received the support it describes #Morsi

I fly to New York tonight to represent a the State of Israel upon the UN stage
I call upon all Members of this Assembly to support the efforts of the #Somali Government #Morsi
Today peoples of the region will not tolerate being deprived of their rights, either by their own leaders or outside forces #Morsi
People, esp. in our region, no longer tolerates the continued non-access of any country to the Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty #Morsi
Egypt stresses the necessity of holding a conference on a Middle East free of nuclear weapons and all other mass dest. weapons #Morsi
The conference on achieving a ME free of nuclear weapons and all other weapons of mass dest. should be held before end of 2012 #Morsi
we also emphasize the right of all countries of the region to the peaceful use of nuclear energy within the framework of the NPT #Morsi
[Adm-02] President Aquino underscored the contributions of structural engineers in helping the government to... http://t.co/9gsU7tok
The world has the responsibility to support Africa's efforts, beyond mere promises #Morsi
Today, we, as Africans, have to achieve for our continent a new set of ambitious goals #Morsi
I assure you that Egypt continues to support its brothers and sisters in Africa #Morsi
There is a need to work diligently to reform the international financial system based on justice, freedom and dignity #Morsi
Revitalizing #UNGA and reforming the Security Council must remain high on the priority list we must tackle with seriousness #Morsi
I would like to emphasize the need for the UN to give special attention to supporting issues of women and youth #Morsi

The ministerial formation will be a national consensus government that meets the aspirations of the people in all its political classes and will be presented to the National Congress before the specified period
Egypt would like to stress that the international system will not get fixed as long as the application of double standards remains #Morsi
We expect from others, as they expect from us, that they respect our cultural particulars and religious points of reference #Morsi
The vicious campaigns in some regions of the world against what Muslims and migrants held sacred was violating their human rights #Morsi
We must act together in the face of extremism, discrimination, and incitement to hatred on the basis of religion or race #Morsi
The obscenities recently released as part of an organized campaign against Islam's prophet is unacceptable and requires a firm stand #Morsi
Egypt supports the freedom of expression.One that is not directed towards one particular religion or culture #Morsi
We also stand firmly against the use of violence in expressing objection to these obscenities #Morsi
I am looking forward with big hope and see in horizon the peace that is based on justice, cooperation and equality #Morsi
